definitions.text: the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
examples: he deserves a good kick in the butt
are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?

definitions.text: hardy and sure-footed animal smaller and with longer ears than the horse
evaluate or estimate the nature, quality, ability, extent, or significance of
examples: I will have the family jewels appraised by a professional
access all the factors when taking a risk

definitions.text: charge (a person or a property) with a payment, such as a tax or a fine
set or determine the amount of (a payment such as a fine)
estimate the value of (property) for taxation
examples: Our house hasn't been assessed in years
